channel.title: emma-kominek on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in emma-kominek on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a fourth year undergraduate student majoring in Zoology at the University of Guelph. Through my time as an undergrad at Guelph, I have developed strong interests in community ecology, evolution, population genetics, and animal behaviour. I am working on an undergraduate thesis where I will be working with PhD student Anna Solecki and my advisor, Karl Cottenie, studying fly community structure and diversity in the subarctic at varying nested spatial scales.
